title: Stylish Italian Apartment Stay by Lake Como
description: Live la dolce vita in Italy’s A-lister playground with five nights in a stylish self-contained apartment at the newly opened La Perla by Sedar. Nestled in the foothills of the Alps, Lake Como is the glamorous home of George Clooney, million-dollar Renaissance villas, Michelin-starred restaurants and some of the most breathtaking scenery in the whole of Italy.
offer_address: Viale Fratelli Rosselli, 1, 22100 Como CO, Italy

title: Boutique Apartment Stay by Picturesque Lake Como
description: Discover Italy’s A-lister playground with a stylish stay in a self-contained apartment at the newly opened La Perla by Sedar. Nestled in the foothills of the Alps, Lake Como is the glamorous home of million-dollar Renaissance villas, Michelin-starred restaurants and some of the most breathtaking scenery in the whole of Italy. Enjoy a basket full of goodies on arrival, including pasta, olive oil and conserve.
offer_address: Viale Fratelli Rosselli, 1, 22100 Como CO, Italy
